text: ninnal ninnalute sapathannale an'yean'yam catiprayeagattinulla margamakkikkalayarutâ€Œ. (islamil) nilpuraccatin sesam padam itaripeakanum, allahuvinre margattil ninn alukale tatannatu nimittam ninnal ketuti anubhavikkanum at karanamayittirum. ninnalkk bhayankaramaya siksayuntayirikkukayum ceyyum
